body:
This can be more easily understood as a flat map:
```
def  expand_options(i, a):
  if a['simple_type'] != 'TensorOptions':
    return [a]
  assert('tensor_options_arg_index' not in n)
  decl['tensor_options_arg_index'] = n
  return [ {...}, {...}, {...} ]
decl['arguments'] = [ a for x in expand_options(i, arg) for i, arg in enumerate(decl['arguments']) ]
```

body_text:
This can be more easily understood as a flat map:
def  expand_options(i, a):
  if a['simple_type'] != 'TensorOptions':
    return [a]
  assert('tensor_options_arg_index' not in n)
  decl['tensor_options_arg_index'] = n
  return [ {...}, {...}, {...} ]
decl['arguments'] = [ a for x in expand_options(i, arg) for i, arg in enumerate(decl['arguments']) ]
